import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import {Link, redirect} from 'react-router-dom' import { Form,Row,Col,Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Loader from "../components/Loader" import Message from "../components/Message" import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from './FormContainer' import { useNavigate, useLocation } from "react-router-dom" import { register } from '../components/actions/userAction' export default function ShippingPage() { const cart = useSelector(state =>state.cart) const {shippingAddress} = cart const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city, setCity] = useState(shippingAddress.city) const [country, setCountry] = useState(shippingAddress.country) const [postalcode, setPostalcode] = useState(shippingAddress.postalcode) const submitHandler = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() console.log('Submitted') } return (

Shipping

Address setAddress(e.target.value)} required > City setCity(e.target.value)} required > Country setCountry(e.target.value)} required > Postal Code setPostalcode(e.target.value)} required >
) }
